Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Capital City in 1980...
Had first career hit on 8/8/1980, off Toby Hay (LYN)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/25/1981, off Joseph Reddington (LYN)...
Injured on 5/30/1983 with a Broken Cheekbone, out for 6 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Lynchburg on 8/10/1984...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/1/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $6,500,000 per year...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1991...
